name: updateNetworkWebhooksHttpServer
description: Update an HTTP server. To change a URL, create a new HTTP server.

name.description: A name for easy reference to the HTTP server

payloadTemplate.description: The payload template to use when posting data to the HTTP server.

payloadTemplateId.description: The ID of the payload template. Defaults to 'wpt_00001' for the Meraki template. For Meraki-included templates: for the Webex (included) template use 'wpt_00002'; for the Slack (included) template use 'wpt_00003'; for the Microsoft Teams (included) template use 'wpt_00004'; for the ServiceNow (included) template use 'wpt_00006'

sharedSecret.description: A shared secret that will be included in POSTs sent to the HTTP server. This secret can be used to verify that the request was sent by Meraki.

$ul: **name**: A name for easy reference to the HTTP server
**payloadTemplate**: The payload template to use when posting data to the HTTP server.
**name**: The name of the payload template.
**payloadTemplateId**: The ID of the payload template.
**url**: The URL of the HTTP server.
